'''Court of Justice's Newsstand''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Court of Justice's Newsstand is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest that spawns after completing a [[Time Trial Challenge]] outside the [[Court of Fontaine]].

</gallery>
